body: honestly the third couple just added new possibilities to how this might end, usually they either ended up full on switching their partner permanently, realized it was just a fling and go back to their usual routine appreciating each other more, or just full on NTR route, lookin forward to how it will end, good shit

I'm still genuinely curious about how this is going to end. I see the black haired boy being the one to get fucked over in the end, due to the fact that the blond haired girl no longer seem interested in him. Maybe he'll get with the girl wearing glasses or fuck boy might get both girls.
Huh. Adding a third couple? I was fully expecting this to go the same tired NTR route most of these swinging stories tend to do.
